the food was somewhat tasteless but the ambiance was pleasant our server was friendly although her loud voice startled us and others nearby whenever she approached the table the dessert was quite delicious and appeared to be freshly made onsite
in the hotels bathroom i occupied myself for a few hours that night
as we often take part in competitions side by side the proprietor is highly esteemed for never neglecting to meet my needs when it matters most thanks to their proximity to hendertucky
slow service bartender got in an argument  with a guest about warm beer glasses margarita was watery and took forever to come out guacamole tasted like it had mayo in it bring back chinita
